description: This source file implements the PermissionsClient class, which communicates with a gRPC permission service to perform operations such as enumerating, getting, granting, setting, revoking, deleting permissions, and handling tokens and registries related to permissions in a client-server architecture.

classes.name: PermissionsClient
classes.description: Client class for interfacing with the gRPC AppPermissionsService to manage permissions, tokens, and associated metadata.

methods.name: void ApplyDeadline(grpc::ClientContext & ctx,const uint32_t grpcTimeoutMs)
methods.description: Sets a deadline on the gRPC ClientContext if a non-zero timeout is specified.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::PermissionsClient
methods.description: Constructs the client with endpoint details, credentials, and timeout configurations.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::CreateChannel
methods.description: Creates a gRPC channel with optional TLS and idle timeout settings.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::EnumeratePermissions
methods.description: Requests a list of permissions for an application, with filtering options.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::Get
methods.description: Retrieves application permissions for a given app and partner, based on identifiers.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::Grant
methods.description: Grants specific permissions to an application, updating its permission set.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::Set
methods.description: Sets or updates permissions for an application, including bundles and includes/excludes.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::Revoke
methods.description: Revokes permissions from an application, impacting its permission set.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::Delete
methods.description: Deletes permissions associated with an app and partner.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::Authorize
methods.description: Performs authorization based on session token and filters, returning permitted access levels.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::GetAllForApp
methods.description: Fetches all permissions for a specific application.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::GetAllAppKeys
methods.description: Retrieves all application keys accessible or registered.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::GetThorTokenRPC
methods.description: Obtains a token from the Thor permission system for a specific app and session parameters.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::GetRegisteredPermissions
methods.description: Gets all registered permissions for the client, typically for management or synchronization.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::RegisterPermissions
methods.description: Registers or updates permissions on the server, optionally replacing all existing ones.

methods.name: PermissionsClient::DeleteRegisteredPermission
methods.description: Removes a specific registered permission from the server.

methods.name: uint32_t Authorize(const std::string & sessionToken,const std::vector<std::string> & filters,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId,std::vector<std::string> & outPermissions) const
std::shared_ptr<grpc::Channel> CreateChannel(const std::string & endpoint,const std::shared_ptr<grpc::ChannelCredentials> & creds,const uint32_t idleTimeoutMs)
std::shared_ptr<grpc::Channel> CreateChannel(const std::string & endpoint,const bool useTls,const uint32_t idleTimeoutMs)
uint32_t Delete(const std::string & appId,const std::string & partnerId,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId) const

uint32_t DeleteRegisteredPermission(const ottx::permission::Permission & permission,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId) const

uint32_t EnumeratePermissions(const std::string & appId,const std::string & partnerId,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::vector<std::string> & filters,std::vector<std::string> & outPermissions) const

uint32_t Get(const std::string & appId,const std::string & partnerId,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,ottx::permission::ApplicationPermissions & outAppPermissions) const
uint32_t GetAllAppKeys(const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId,std::vector<ottx::permission::AppKeys> & outKeys) const

uint32_t GetAllForApp(const std::string & app,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId,std::vector<ottx::permission::ApplicationPermissions> & outList) const

uint32_t GetRegisteredPermissions(const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId,std::vector<ottx::permission::Permission> & outPermissions) const

uint32_t GetThorTokenRPC(const std::string & app,const std::string & contentProvider,const std::string & deviceSessionId,const std::string & appSessionId,const std::string & tokenMode,int32_t ttl,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId,std::string & outToken) const

PermissionsClient(const std::string & endpoint,std::shared_ptr<grpc::ChannelCredentials> creds,const uint32_t grpcTimeoutMs,const uint32_t idleTimeoutMs)

uint32_t RegisterPermissions(const std::vector<ottx::permission::Permission> & permissions,bool replaceAll,const std::string & bearerToken,const std::string & deviceId,const std::string & accountId,const std::string & partnerId) const
